This notebook constructs the `us_crs_history.Rdata` object, which contains a longitudinal record of US CRS scores for each heart transplant candidate. The data is sourced from the SRTR SAF, heart justification, and risk stratification files, which are processed to create a time-varying US CRS score.

```{r}
# Load essential libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(haven)  # For reading SRTR SAS files
library(lubridate)  # For date handling
library(here) # For file path management
```

```{r}
# Specify file paths
tx_hr_path <- here("data", "tx_hr.sas7bdat")
cand_thor_path <- here("data", "cand_thor.sas7bdat")
## TO DO: heart justification files, risk adjustment files
```
